login.loginError: The username or password is incorrect

slide1.text: You will be able to test your software applications on any platform and device, and reuse the automatic tests to adapt in an agile way to the functional advances of the software. You can also carry out rapid, regressive and agile prototyping. Easily reuse your tests. Automate once and test as much as you need.
slide1.title: Your software tests

slide2.text: You will be able to automate your online transactions: purchase, product loading, price update, transaction verification, banking and much more. Generate probes that automatically check the availability of your products. Make sure your online business operations keep running, even if there are external or internal changes.
slide2.title: Your online transaction processes

slide3.text: You will be able to apply DevOps and Continuous Integration practices, introducing automatic processes throughout the software development cycle, to accelerate the speed of putting new functionalities into production, and better adapt to the requests of your users.
slide3.title: Your application deployments
